reporting-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

title.narrative: Promotion of cultural identity in the Paraguayan Chaco to reinforce communities' ties to the land

description.narrative: Support the science and practice of food, feed, and fiber production (including forestry, wildlife, fisheries, aquaculture and floriculture) and its relationships to natural resources, processing, marketing, distribution, utilization (including nutrition), and trade.

This award strives to support the science and practice of food, feed, and fiber production (including forestry, wildlife, fisheries, aquaculture and floriculture) and its relationships to natural resources, processing, marketing, distribution, utilization (including nutrition), and trade. In addition, this award Asociación Sombra de Árbol (ASdeA) will work with indigenous and creole communities in the remote Paraguayan Chaco? a region challenged with extreme poverty, a lack of government presence and harsh environment - to improve their livelihoods and food secur.

participating-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

owner-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

mailing-address.narrative: 1331 Pennsylvania Ave. NW, Suite 1200 NorthÂ Washington, DC 20004

description.narrative: The Government of Paraguay is making significant advances in fighting corruption and impunity and eradicating extreme poverty. Encouraged by a recently approved Freedom of Information Law and widely available public notices, citizens are denouncing irregularities and sending a clear message that corruption will not be tolerated. Although high levels of income inequality remain, Paraguayan government programs are producing positive results in reducing poverty and in countering illicit activities in the northern region. U.S. assistance programs add momentum to these positive developments, helping Paraguay strengthen its democratic institutions and supporting more equitable and environmentally sustainable economic growth.
Obligates the award for the Award Implementing Organization to carry out the activities set forth in Annex A of the grant agreement.
